title: Snowflake Native App Framework Changes to the version output for the SHOW APPLICATIONS and DESC APPLICATION commands | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
For applications created using staged files,
the output of the SHOW APPLICATIONS and
DESCRIBE APPLICATION will change as follows:

The value of the version column of the SHOW APPLICATIONS command
is dev_stage.

The value of the version row of the DESCRIBE APPLICATION command
is dev_stage.

The value of the version column of the SHOW APPLICATIONS command
will be UNVERSIONED.

The value of the version row of the DESCRIBE APPLICATION command
is UNVERSIONED.
